<<<<<<< HEAD
A treatise of the power of godlinesse: consisting of three parts. 1 wherein it consists. 2 cautions against, and discoveries of, several mistakes and hinderances, most common to the people of God. 3 several means and helps for attaining of it. / By Thomas White, preacher of Gods Word in London. White, Thomas, Presbyterian minister in London.
[6], 423, [9] p.
Printed by R.I. for Joseph Cranford, and are to bee sold at his shop at the sign of the Kings Head, in St. Pauls Church-yard, London, : 1658.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Sept:"; "Sept. 3". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
